name: Skippy's Adventures
description:
How does it apply to the theme? 

You have only TWO seconds to fling the spider!

LITTLE JUMPING SPIDER SKIPPY IS GOING ON AN ADVENTURE IN THE GIGANTIC TROPICAL JUNGLE AND HE DESPERATELY NEEDS YOUR HELP EXPLORING IT.

HELP HIM LAND ON THE MAGNIFICENT FLOWERS AND HUGE GREEN LEAVES, BUT DON'T FORGET TO AVOID LURKING MONSTROUS PLANTS.
